name: Double Feature: Mystery at Pinecrest Manor
overview: A Mystery Double Feature is a series of two mystery-themed choose your own adventure games. In Mystery at Pinecrest Manor, the player has been invited to his Uncle Ralph's home in coastal Maine to see the unveiling of a newly acquires Egyptian statue. You meet a number of other people there for the unveiling, and then later go to sleep. The next morning, the statue has been stolen. You must visit the other rooms of the manor to gather clues about who committed the theft. After gathering all the clues, you must name the thief and the location of the hidden statue.
